spec_data.Name: perl-PHP-Serialization
spec_data.Description:
Provides a simple, quick means of serializing perl memory structures
(including object data!) into a format that PHP can deserialize() and
access, and vice versa.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:47:34 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Converts between PHP's serialize() output and the equivalent Perl structure
